/usr/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/common.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/model_loader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/ppc.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/hard_shadow.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs  libtinyobj.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
